title: This Pig Ottoman Went Viral on Twitter, and It’s So Oinking Cute
excerpt: “No thoughts just pig ottoman” is Twitter user @2Saddington’s quarantine mood — and it’s a relatable one at that. This cute little footstool from Target went viral on March 3 with over 100,000 retweets.The Burton New Velvet Pig Ottoman could be yours for less than $60 — though certain colorways in some areas are, unsurprisingly, sold out after the footstool’s five minutes of fame.
